# Sample Project PRD

## Overview

A simple REST API for managing todo items. Built with Node.js and Express.

## Features

### Phase 1: Core API
- Create, read, update, delete todo items
- SQLite database for storage
- Input validation

### Phase 2: Authentication
- JWT-based authentication
- User registration and login
- Protected routes

### Phase 3: Deployment
- Docker containerization
- Health check endpoint
- CI/CD pipeline
